name: blast furnace production | blast furnace | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3744/documentation

Assumptions for medium sized plant. Output: 1'500'000 t/a, life time: 50 years. Site is shared with BOF converter.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts from the transformation of unspecified land to industrial area.

Infrastructure for input material unloading and storage, blast furnace processes and casting and for administrative buildings.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Some Swiss datasets are used for European processes.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Assumed technology of medium sized plant.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see Geography This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
